section.title: Activities
section.para: The single activity object for &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor is the org.mobicents.slee.resource.jdbc.JdbcActivity interface. Through the activity an SBB can execute JDBC tasks, and receive the related task execution results asynchronously through events on it. Due to the nature of SLEE activities, this RA activity acts like a queue of requests, allowing the processing of their responses - the events- in a serialized way
An activity starts on demand by an SBB, through the RA SBB Interface, and it ends when an SBB invokes its endActivity() method.
The activity interface is defined as follows:

listitem.para: Executes the specified task. An exception event will be fired if the task execution throws an exception.
Ends the activity and its related Activity Context.
